unnormalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for securing fresh talent. IIT Delhi continues to produce exceptional graduates. Companies like TCS and Infosys actively participate. Careful planning is essential, akin to scriptwriting for a successful Bollywood film. Remember the recruitment process can make or break the team. A well-structured campus drive yields talented individuals. Packages upwards of Rs. 10 Lakhs are expected. Focus on candidates willing to relocate 500 km for the role.
normalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for securing fresh talent. I I T Delhi continues to produce exceptional graduates. Companies like T C S and Infosys actively participate. Careful planning is essential, akin to scriptwriting for a successful Bollywood film. Remember the recruitment process can make or break the team. A well-structured campus drive yields talented individuals. Packages upwards of rupee ten lakhs are expected. Focus on candidates willing to relocate five hundred kilometer for the role.
